abstract.text: Returns an index that is the specified distance from the given index,
unless that distance is beyond a given limiting index.

string’s starting index and then prints the character at that position.
The operation doesn’t require going beyond the limiting

code: if let i = s.index(s.startIndex, offsetBy: 4, limitedBy: s.endIndex) {
